Reviews.Title: A little disappointed
Reviews.Author: Product Tester
Reviews.Content: The sticker is about the size of a dollar coin; therefore, the writing is very difficult to see. Since this is a surveillance system decal it should be visible to see from at least 5 feet or so. The shipping cost is also on the high end since they charge $4.00 to do so when it actually costs 44 cents (first class mail envelope). Overall, I would not recommend this product from this seller at all.

Reviews.Title: Appears Sturdy and Durable
Reviews.Author: E. Fisher
Reviews.Content: These stickers appear sturdy and durable.  They are reasonably thick and the ink is on pretty thick so they may last.  I put one on the glass block windows next to my front door a couple of months ago and it still looks new.  No pealing around the edges so far.Maybe in a couple of years I could update this review with information on how the sticker wears, but seriously, how much time can one spend reviewing stickers?  :-)

Reviews.Title: Great for home security systems
Reviews.Author: Item Seller
Reviews.Content: Most of the surveillance stickers I found were large and would dominate the window.  These are about 3"x3", which is great for home use next to the security system sticker.

Reviews.Title: Misrepresented Product
Reviews.Author: Marc Norris
Reviews.Content: These decals are only 2 inches wide.  Nowhere in the product description was that mentioned, and I was charged almost $10 for 6 of them.  I was expecting signs AND decals, but received only little tiny sticker decals.  Very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Window Signs
Reviews.Author: Daisy
Reviews.Content: Decals were nice plastic easy adhesive. Professional grade.  Outside sturdy.  Well worth the $'s for window applications. Not too large of size but large enough.

Reviews.Title: IT SERVES ITS PURPOSE
Reviews.Author: Melonie
Reviews.Content: What do you say about stickers in 14 words or more these stickers serve there purpose I have had them on the windows for a year now and we haven't had a break in yet.......

Reviews.Title: Great deterrent
Reviews.Author: Pinkie,      Idaho. "Sandra   W."
Reviews.Content: Have them placed above my camera's and front and back door! and in my windows.  Nice... Not having anymore problems.

Reviews.Title: Just an added touch of warning
Reviews.Author: Jeff Goldberg
Reviews.Content: I was told beleave it or not this little sticker is a great deterent to theives so I bought them

Reviews.Title: Love these
Reviews.Author: Coinzzfortoys
Reviews.Content: Love these, they really stand out and high quality decals should last a while, have them placed all around windows of house. Compliment my cameras!!

Reviews.Title: Great Stickers
Reviews.Author: Sara J Rose
Reviews.Content: Stickers look just as advertised, placed them on every door of my house. Taped them on inside of windows to keep from being affected by weather. Well worth the price for extra security notification.

Reviews.Title: shipped as advertised
Reviews.Author: robert frost "homedoit"
Reviews.Content: Items arrived in good padded envelope.  They appear hardy, but I wish they attached on inside of glass as opposed to on top of it, outside. So far no fading, other than a metal or plastic sign, these are as good as it gets,  I would buy again from this company, of course just wish they were less costly, only reason for 4 and not 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: great stickers
Reviews.Author: Design Diva "Design Diva"
Reviews.Content: We used these stickers in addition to the matching sign after a theft in our driveway.  Although the theft was caught by our cameras, I think if we had these to begin with, it would have deterred the kids from coming into our yard.  I placed this on the mail box in the street and have been surprised how many neighbors noticed it. I also placed them in other locations around the outside of the house.  They are nice quality and have endured the elements. The color has not faded and they have not peeled back or bubbled.  I highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: Does not fad in sun!
Reviews.Author: Tyler Puckett
Reviews.Content: Great sticker. Does not fade in the sun like the kind that came with the security camera I bought. Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: great!
Reviews.Author: quality matters
Reviews.Content: unable to find replacement stickers for security system so got these-- definitely does the job & like that they're inexpensive & work very well!

Reviews.Title: Perfect size exterior decal
Reviews.Author: Tina
Reviews.Content: Not obtrusive but bright enough to give required warning of video taping premises.  Compliments my other same size security warning sticker.

Reviews.Title: Just as described
Reviews.Author: LegacyMaster
Reviews.Content: Price is a little high and shipping took forever other than that it is all good. Do think it is on the expensive side and shipping is a bit much??

ProductInfo.Name: 6 Alarm System Surveillance Camera Warning Decals
